Navigation
Name Tutor/Markup/InlineMarkup/Code
Synopsis Create inline code fragments.
Syntax ` MarkedText `
Description Creates inline fragments of text that represent code. Inside the MarkedText, other markup can be used.
Examples `if` gives if
